night_horizons.transformers.preprocessors module¶

class night_horizons.transformers.preprocessors.GeoTIFFPreprocessor(crs: str | CRS = 'EPSG:3857', passthrough: bool = True, spatial_error: float = 0.0, padding_fraction: float = 0.1)¶
